entities.name: centaur
entities.description: The centaur is described as having arms wrapped around their knees or folded tightly across their chests, looking rather nervous. It was also mentioned that the centaur has astonishingly blue eyes and a white-blond head.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is described as a centaur who stood in the middle of the room. He is said to have surveyed Harry unblinkingly through his blue eyes but did not smile. It was also mentioned that there was the shadow of a hoof-shaped bruise on Firenze's chest.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is described as entering the room and shaking hands with Firenze. He is said to be on speaking terms with Firenze, whom the other students find intimidating.

entities.name: students
entities.description: The students are described as looking at Harry with awe, apparently deeply impressed that he was on speaking terms with Firenze.

relationships.description: Harry Potter and Firenze are described as being on speaking terms, suggesting a friendly relationship between them. It was also mentioned that it was foretold that they would meet again.
The students are described as looking at Harry with awe, apparently deeply impressed that he was on speaking terms with Firenze. This suggests that Harry is admired by the students.
Firenze and Harry Potter are described as being on speaking terms, suggesting a friendly relationship between them. It was also mentioned that it was foretold that they would meet again.
The students are described as finding Firenze intimidating, suggesting a relationship of intimidation between them and Firenze.
